name: Chaotic Clutter
description:
Welcome to Chaotic Clutter, a game about getting the most points possible. How do you get these points? You drag a stop sign that minions endlessly follow to some point boosters! Be careful though, traffic cones are your mortal enemy to these minions. And finally, can you beat my high score of 1474?

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 (Theme: Let There Be CHAOS!)
